thread.section_title: Enchanting Travels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Enchanting Travels | enchantingtravels.com
thread.title: cynnie

author: cynnie
title: cynnie
text:
We have had three trips organized by Enchanting Travel. Each one has been a huge success, from our trip organizer (Swati) to our trip co-ordiantor (Sneha) to the overall feel of all guides (Taupo) and drivers we encountered.
We have travelled throughout Rajasthan, to the south in Cochin and Kerala, the Maldives, Western India, Rohet and Jaisalmer and each step of the way, ET has been there for us.
We are thinking of heading down to South America for our next series of explorations, and you can bet we wouldn't go with ET being in charge of us everywhere.
Thank you all for the most unforgettable trip, again!
